thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I read multiple reviews of the Flowermate. And was impressed the pricepoint of an obviously high quality device. After initially burning off any chamer residue from manufacturing , I ran a nicely packed chamber through the different settings. This unit is very impressive for overall flavor and product delivery and I will absolutely be showing this piece off to others. My only regret is not being aware when I ordered that I could order a water pipe adapter for it so thats forthcoming. They have a very unique grinder as well so maybe order both. Fantastic experience thus far!
